definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: He is forced to ride in a second-class cabin because the train is unusually full.
sentences.chinese: 他被迫乘坐二等艙，因爲火車是非常充分。

sentences.english: Wing section and survival rates as second-class cabin seats 56%.
sentences.chinese: 機翼段和二等艙段座位的生還率同爲56%。

sentences.english: I got a second-class ticket on the train to New York.
sentences.chinese: 我弄到一張去紐約的二等艙火車票。

sentences.english: Do you have two Second Class cabins available on the date I mentioned?
sentences.chinese: 你有兩張我提到的那個日子的二等艙票嗎？

sentences.english: I want to reserve a berth of second class cabin.
sentences.chinese: 我想預計一張二等艙的臥鋪票。

sentences.english: To save money, we traveled second-class.
sentences.chinese: 爲了省錢，我們乘坐二等艙旅行。

sentences.english: He bought a ticket to travel in the second class on the boat trip.
sentences.chinese: 他買了一張二等艙的船票去旅行。

sentences.english: There are still some second-class cabins.
Second class is the best class of cabin available?
It was a tourist class waiter who was calling me to wake up.
sentences.chinese: 這是二等艙的侍者催我起牀的聲音。

sentences.english: By the time coach travelers are called, the overhead bins seem to be already full.
sentences.chinese: 輪到二等艙的旅客時，倉頂行李箱似乎已經滿了。

sentences.english: I want to go coach, and i'd prefer a morning flight.
sentences.chinese: 我要二等艙，最好是早上的航班。

sentences.english: Both first-class and second-class cabins have private baths.
sentences.chinese: 一等艙和二等艙裏都有衛生間。

sentences.english: Book me two second class seats, please.
sentences.chinese: 請給我訂兩張二等艙機票。

sentences.english: What's the second-class fare from Chicago to Los Angeles?
sentences.chinese: 從芝加哥到洛杉磯的二等艙價格是多少？
